audioText: Les experts pensent que cette nouvelle technologie révolutionnera peut-être complètement notre façon de travailler.
question: What do the experts think about the new technology?
options: It might completely revolutionize how we work
It will definitely improve workplace efficiency
It could replace all current technology
It may cause problems in the workplace
explanation: The text states 'Les experts pensent que cette nouvelle technologie révolutionnera peut-être complètement notre façon de travailler' - The experts think that this new technology might completely revolutionize our way of working. The adverb 'peut-être' indicates uncertainty or possibility.
